concept.title: Overriding gfcpp.properties Settings
concept.shortdesc: Application developers have the option of configuring system attributes programmatically, rather than using the gfcpp.properties file.

conbody.p: Attributes set programmatically override any matching attribute settings in the gfcpp.properties file, but additional attributes not set programmatically will be configured using the settings in gfcpp.properties.
